document.full_text: japanese government officials said wednesday they are reviewing the possibility of establishing a legally enforceable 'caution zone' around the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant with a radius of 12 miles.
document.title: japan prohibits access to nuclear evacuation zone
lines_and_colors: japanese government officials said wednesday they are reviewing the possibility of establishing a legally enforceable 'caution zone' around the fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant with a radius of 12 miles.
